item.title: IF a absX,absY changes npc position doesn't change
item.dc:creator: @penguinimp penguinimp
item.description:
@penguinimp wrote:

Source: Delta

So if I have an NPC teleport (like a blink, I think this affects players too) they’re position gets changed however, they look like they are in the same position, If I have that npc attack another npc, they can be up to 10 squares away attacking that npc.

Sometimes I have an npc attacking me from 10 squares away, and I attack the npc next to me (but it looks like he’s 10 squares away)

How do I fix this, here’s my teleport coode, I think I need something as simple as a

npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
                                if (teleport) {
                                    if (misc.random(99)+1 <= teleport_chance) {
                                        gfxAll(191, npcs[i].absY, npcs[i].absX);
                                        npcs[i].absX += misc.random(npcs[i].moveX*10);
                                        npcs[i].absY += misc.random(npcs[i].moveY*10);
                                        gfxAll(191, npcs[i].absY, npcs[i].absX);
                                        println("Actual X:"+npcs[i].absX +" Y:"+npcs[i].absY);
                                        npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
                                    }
                                }
